title: Cincinnati, view from the Carlisle Hotel
alternateTitle: Cincinnati buildings, landmarks and street scenes. 68

source.collection: Cincinnati buildings, landmarks and street scenes

viewpoint.description: View of Cincinnati from the Carlisle Hotel, a little west of St. Peter in Chains

description: Historic 1874 view of Cincinnati from the Carlisle Hotel, showcasing the city's buildings, landmarks, and street scenes. This illustration captures Cincinnati's urban development during the post-Civil War era, with prominent spires and architectural features visible from this elevated downtown vantage point.
